title: 新约 - 提摩太前书(1 Timothy) - 第 4 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 提摩太前书(1 Timothy) -- 第 4 章 ( 本篇共有 6 章 )

lineList.en: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;
lineList.cn: 圣灵明说，在后来的时候，必有人离弃真道，听从那引诱人的（邪）灵，和鬼魔的道理。

lineList.en: Speaking lies in hypocrisy; having their conscience seared with a hot iron;
lineList.cn: 这是因为说谎之人的假冒。这等人的良心，如同被热铁烙惯了一般。

lineList.en: Forbidding to marry, and commanding to abstain from meats, which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth.
lineList.cn: 他们禁止嫁娶，又禁戒食物，（或作又叫人戒荤）就是神所造叫那信而明白真道的人，感谢着领受的。

lineList.en: For every creature of God is good, and nothing to be refused, if it be received with thanksgiving:
lineList.cn: 凡神所造的物，都是好的。若感谢着领受，就没有一样可弃的。

lineList.en: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer.
lineList.cn: 都因神的道和人的祈求，成为圣洁了。

lineList.en: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things, thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ, nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine, whereunto thou hast attained.
lineList.cn: 你若将这些事题醒弟兄们，便是基督耶稣的好执事，在真道的话语，和你向来所服从的善道上，得了教育。

lineList.en: But refuse profane and old wives' fables, and exercise thyself rather unto godliness.
lineList.cn: 只是要弃绝那世俗的言语，和老妇荒渺的话，在敬虔上操练自己。

lineList.en: For bodily exercise profiteth little: but godliness is profitable unto all things, having promise of the life that now is, and of that which is to come.
lineList.cn: 操练身体，益处还少。惟独敬虔，凡事都有益处。因有今生和来生的应许。

lineList.en: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation.
lineList.cn: 这话是可信的，是十分可佩服的。

lineList.en: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach, because we trust in the living God, who is the Saviour of all men, specially of those that believe.
lineList.cn: 我们劳苦努力，正是为此。因我们的指望在乎永生的神。他是万人的救主，更是信徒的救主。
这些事你要吩咐人，也要教导人。

lineList.en: Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an example of the believers, in word, in conversation, in charity, in spirit, in faith, in purity.
lineList.cn: 不可叫人小看你年轻。总要在言语，行为，爱心，信心，清洁上，都作信徒的榜样。

lineList.en: Till I come, give attendance to reading, to exhortation, to doctrine.
lineList.cn: 你要以宣读，劝勉，教导为念，直等到我来。

lineList.en: Neglect not the gift that is in thee, which was given thee by prophecy, with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery.
lineList.cn: 你不可轻忽所得的恩赐，就是从前藉着预言，在众长老按手的时候，赐给你的。

lineList.en: Meditate upon these things; give thyself wholly to them; that thy profiting may appear to all.
lineList.cn: 这些事你要殷勤去作，并要在此专心，使众人看出你的长进来。

lineList.en: Take heed unto thyself, and unto the doctrine; continue in them: for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself, and them that hear thee.
lineList.cn: 你要谨慎自己和自己的教训，要在这些事上恒心。因为这样行，又能救自己，又能救听你的人。
